sentences.en: A marble entrance hall leads to a sitting room.
sentences.cn: 大理石门厅通往起居室。

sentences.en: A wooden building painted to look like marble is meretricious.
sentences.cn: 一座漆得像大理石般的木制建筑物外表是美丽的.

sentences.en: He chiselled an inscription on the marble.
Her heels clacked on the marble floor.
sentences.cn: 她的鞋后跟在大理石地面上发出咔嗒咔嗒的响声。
大理石是一种珍贵的石料.

sentences.en: Skillfully placed lights throw the marble figures into clear relief.
sentences.cn: 巧妙配置的灯光把大理石雕像映衬得栩栩如生.

sentences.en: The columns were of white marble.
The dome was supported by white marble columns.
sentences.cn: 圆顶由白色大理石柱支撑着.

sentences.en: The statue was carved out of marble.
sentences.cn: 这尊像是大理石雕成的.

sentences.en: The temple is supported by marble columns.
sentences.cn: 这座庙宇由大理石柱支撑。

sentences.en: The workmen quarried out a huge block of marble.
sentences.cn: 工人们从采石场采得一块很大的大理石.

sentences.en: There is a marble statue on the corner of the street.
sentences.cn: 街的拐角处就有一大理石雕塑.

sentences.en: This marble ramp weighs one ton.
sentences.cn: 这个大理石台阶重一吨.

sentences.en: Traders in Marble Arch are facing huge rent increases.
sentences.cn: 大理石拱门的经销商们面临租金的大幅上涨。

words.tran_cn: 大理石的；有大理石般色彩纹理的
弄成大理石花纹；大理石状纹理
大理石花纹；大理石纹加工法；猪、牛肉的细脂肪纹路
把…弄上大理石花纹（marble的过去分词）
把（书边等）弄上大理石花纹；把肉肥瘦均匀搭配好（marble的现在分词）
作成大理石状；使有大理石花纹
大理石,云石,大理石制品

phrases.tran_cn: 大理石拱门（有名的伦敦标志）

trans.tran_cn: 大理石，大理石制品，弹子游戏，理智，常识
trans.tran_en: a type of hard rock that becomes smooth when it is polished, and is used for making buildings,  statue s  etc
